summary: Artificial Intelligence tools show promise for improving health care. They can help predict health trajectories, recommend treatments, and automate administrative tasks. Challenges associated with these tools include: Transparency: If a medical provider doesn't know how a tool works, it could reduce trust in the tool. Bias: Limitations and bias in data can reduce the safety and effectiveness of AI tools. Data: Obtaining the high-quality data...
title: Artificial Intelligence in Health Care: Benefits and Challenges of Technologies to Augment Patient Care
